segments.text: Hey Nick , what are you up to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not much , just heading over to the shooting range . You wanna come ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Seriously ? You mean to fire a real weapon ? I don ’ t know man .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it will be fun ! I have a 9mm pistol that is really easy to shoot . I also have a revolver that ’ s really fun too ! They have big targets at the range that we could use to practice and improve you
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah that would be cool ! Maybe I can also have a try at other weapons like a machine gun or a shotgun ! Maybe even a rocket launcher or an anti tank missile ! Or what about a flame thrower !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whoa , take it easy there Rambo . Don ’ t get carried away . These weapons are not toys , and you must first learn how to handle them properly . There are basic rules that you must abide by in order to be
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , I didn ’ t know ! It always looks so cool and easy in the movies !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The reality is different you know , running and firing a weapon is a lot harder than in the movies ! So are you ready ?
segments.speaker: S2
